The specially designed 45° curvature fits the natural shape of your nails, allowing precise trimming of ingrown toenails, sharp corners, cuticles, and peeling skin. After repeated grinding and polishing, the curved blades cut smoothly and precisely, without jagging or tearing. These senior nail clippers are rust-resistant and easy to clean, perfect for use in humid environments like bathrooms.
